post.body: Oh, well then, that should definitely last. Be sure to save enough for the fight. lol
That ought to do it Chris... is it all for you? lol
Thanks for the compliment on my site! Continued online success to you too, Peter. ~ Bradley
Are you following @JonathanGunson?
I think that would make it too easy for spammers, but I'd love to know if you find out if there is a way.
It's nice to meet you. @JonathanGunson introduced me to you!
There, I sharpened it up a bit!
... Yule tide carols, being sung by a choir...
It could mean that, lol, but I prefer to look at it as my Tweets and/or my Blog posts, are now "Outside My Brain"
Thanks for the promo!
That's awesome! Congratulations and you two have a wonderful Anniversary together. Big Plans?
Goodnight Jonathan!
Thank you... that's cool!
Brilliant! A warm Holiday Season's Greetings back to you Jonathan . Thanks for putting me on your tree www.TwitterTree.TV
RT @JamesDickey Three Types of Twitter Spammers: http://jamesrdickey.com How many more are there? What do you think? Please Retweet
Look: @JonathanGunson's Christmas Twitter Tree is growing! Are you on it? http://www.twittertree.tv/ Enjoy this wonderful Holiday Season!
